name: michael-zakaryan
description: - backend is simple node js app serve as a proxy - you need to run `yarn start`

scripts.bootstrap: concurrently -n "DB-server,user-service,restaurant-service" "foxx server set toptal http://localhost:8529/ --database toptal" "cd user_foxx && foxx install --server toptal --database toptal /user" "foxx install --server toptal --database toptal /restaurant"
scripts.compose:all: concurrently -n "backend,frontend," "cd backend && yarn start" "cd frontend && yarn start"
